subject: Kiss Goodbye to MS Charity Event

full_threads.body: Kiss Goodbye to MS Charity Event

Hi Heath,


That is okay, I completely understand! We are super happy with this current invite.


Many thanks to you and Joao for putting together a beautiful invite, I can’t wait for our guests to receive them!


If you can please forward the final designs to Tanja, as I will be on leave from Monday onwards.


Warmest regards,


Catherine



Catherine Duong


Kiss Goodbye to MS Campaign Assistant


MS Research Australia

Hi Catherine, 


Please keep in mind that we generally don't do things to 'compare' etc. If something like the wine is an important part of the messaging we can do it for you. However, we keep the pricing we provide to MS Research Australia super low. We achieve this by minimising rework and pieces being created solely for comparison purposes. We can supply these of course,  however, we historically haven't as pricing needs to be kept in check. 


I hope that makes sense, I just wanted to highlight that expectation as we have a long history with the MS Research Australia team and if we are all on the same the page these tasks tend to flow better. 


Let me know if you want us to do some wine additions in this case and if any of the above needs further clarification. 


Thanks, have a great weekend and speak soon,

Hi Joao,


AMAZING, it looks wonderful!!


The banners are also spot on! J


Just a quick thought, are you able to apply a darker shade of green for the lime-coloured leaves?


For the pink font, could we maybe try a wine-red colour? And also add a tint of the wine-red somewhere amongst the flowers?


I just wanted to see what it could look like and compare to this current one J


But, love the work, thank you!!


Warmest regards,


Catherine

Kiss Goodbye to MS Charity Event

Great! In the end we got there :)


We've made the event description and logos straight and applied the design to the homepage slide banner and event featured image. Regarding the event banner we will try to use the same as in the homepage, if needed we will adapt for it.


Once you're ready to create the new event page, let us know and we'll upload the images.


Please see attached all the files.


Thanks

Hi Joao,


It looks amazing!! We really like it! JJ


Just one more little tweak! We prefer the event description to be straight not tilted, same for the logos!


Can you also please apply this for the event banner and website scoller?


Thank you so much for putting this together!!


Warmest regards,


Catherine

Hi Tanja,


Looks like we did send the emails at the same time :)


We did a new version A5 portrait and it flows better for sure. Let us know if you like this option.


Thanks

Hi Joao,


I think we pressed send at the same time J


Love the new colour in the main copy, can you please just change the below:


Just a few final changes:


- I know we asked you to change the format, but we actually think this looks a lot like a book now, can you please make the final version A5 vertical and have the heading on top with the text below?


- Can you please remove the people from the background and create dimension through flowers, a few sparkles here and there or something similar? Even one of the photos from the Grounds look book made transparent and we ask them for approval?


- Can you please also make the dark green background slightly darker? Just a little, as the bright flowers and fairy lights make it quite light, but it’s a night event and we would like it to look mystical


- Is there any way we to make the flowers, plants etc look more real?


- Can you please remove the ‘This is an input tax credit event. GST is not applicable’ sentence


Thank you so much for your amazing help with this!


We can’t wait to send out the invites shortly J


Tanja

Hi Joao,


We love it, thank you so much – well done!!!


Just a few final changes:


- I know we asked you to change the format, but we actually think this looks a lot like a book now, can you please make the final version A5 vertical and have the heading on top with the text below?


- Can you please remove the people from the background and create dimension through flowers, a few sparkles here and there or something similar? Even one of the photos from the Grounds look book made transparent and we ask them for approval?


- Can you please also make the dark green background slightly darker? Just a little, as the bright flowers and fairy lights make it quite light, but it’s a night event and we would like it to look mystical


- Can you please remove the ‘This is an input tax credit event. GST is not applicable’ sentence


Thank you so much for your amazing help with this!


We can’t wait to send out the invites shortly J


Tanja


From: Joao from WP Perk [mailto:joao@wpperk.com]
Sent: Friday, 10 August 2018 12:16 PM
To: Tanja Voss <tvoss@msra.org.au>
Subject: Re: Kiss Goodbye to MS Charity Event


Sent to Catherine Duong and Tanja Voss


Hi Catherine,


Good news, we applied all your feedback on the new design and we believe it looks really good, not busy at all :)


Let us know what you think.


Thanks!

Hi Catherine,


We've done one more version of this one with some colour in the main copy.


Let us know what do you think.


Thanks
Kiss Goodbye to MS Charity Event

Hi Catherine,


Good news, we applied all your feedback on the new design and we believe it looks really good, not busy at all :)


Let us know what you think.


Thanks!

Hi Joao,


Yes all good, she doesn’t know the difference. Just use it as guide of the ratios that she is after.


Thanks,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wpperk.com/email-sig/wpperk-email-logo.png
Heath Maguire lol, what do you think about Catherine 'The Designer'? Regarding the dimension A5, I thought you said we weren't going to do A5, did you chat to Catherine about that previously? Cheers

Hi Catherine,


We will work on it tomorrow morning, hopefully it will not look 'really busy', but we'll do our best.


Regarding the main copy font, at the moment is Helvetica regular and bold. Ideally we should keep the fonts the same as we have been using across all elements of the brand. We normally don't use Calibri, only Helvetica, Open Sans and Yorkshire (handwritten one).

Still not sure about the dark green background...we'll try.


Thanks

Hi Joao,


Thank you so much for sending that through, it’s so much closer to what we have in mind!


Could you please just make the below changes:


- Can we please change the format to horizontal, A5


- Soft, enticing, more secretive, through a dark green background with beautiful fairy lights (feel free to take the previous examples as a template and just make it more ‘Kiss’ like)


- Love the flowers, can you also add some wine


- Can you play around with the font of the main copy, maybe Calibri or Helvetica?


- Can you please delete the big kiss in the background


- Colours could consist out of, dark green, wine red, soft pink


You’re amazing, thank you again!!


Warmest regards,


Catherine

Kiss Goodbye to MS Charity Event

Hi Catherine,


We've created a new version that is much more inline with the kgtms brand and more fresh.


We tried to add more of a darker background to play with the fairy lights and stars, but the invite became really dark and heavy, the flowers didn't work on top of it because there wasn't enough contrast to make them pop.


Let us know if we are in the right direction or if we need to tweak anything.


Thanks
Kiss Goodbye to MS Charity Event

Thank you so much Joao!!


Looking forward to it J


Warmest regards,


Catherine

Hi Catherine,


We'll try to do another version more inline with the style you sent attached, and send for approval this afternoon.


Fingers crossed you like the new version :)


Thanks
Kiss Goodbye to MS Charity Event

Hi Joao,


Thank you for sending through the below!


It’s a little different to what we had in mind, so I’ve attached a few examples again for your reference. The current invite looks very animated, and we would like it to look more clean and simple, but very magical and suitable to our theme and venue. I’ve attached the venue look book and a few examples again for your reference.


Can you please also consider the following:


- Use the KGTMS font for the event name


- Pretty, feminine, fairy lights, florals


- Remove the white box and work out a way on how to blend in the details with the background


- Please also remove the box for the RSVP


- Please insert:


o Join us for an enchanted evening under the stars to raise funds for Kiss Goodbye to MS.


Here are some ideas below.


Thank you so much for your help.


Warmest regards,
Catherine

Help Joao understand how they’re doing:
